message.content:
cs.IT, cs.CC, cs.DS, cs.CR, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with the problem of answering statistical queries, which is a topic in both information theory (cs.IT) and computational complexity (cs.CC). The use of Fourier analysis and the connection to interactive fingerprinting codes suggest a focus on coding theory and combinatorics (cs.DS), while the mention of a hardness assumption and the implication for differential privacy suggest a focus on cryptography (cs.CR) and machine learning (cs.LG).
